alert.note: Alert for Issaquena (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:50PM CDT until April 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR WASHINGTON...NORTH CENTRAL ISSAQUENA...WEST CENTRAL HUMPHREYS AND NORTHWESTERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glen Allan, or 11 miles south of Avon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Panther Burn around 300 PM CDT. Hollandale around 305 PM CDT. Estill around 310 PM CDT. Darlove around 315 PM CDT. Tribbett around 320 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Arcola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
